parole.translation[0].definitions[0].def: permission for someone to leave prison, on the condition that they promise to behave well
parole.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She will become eligible for parole in 19 months.
He was released on parole after serving two years.
parole.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to allow someone to leave prison on the condition that they promise to behave well
